Producer: Tim Bevan, Eric Fellner, Diana Phillips
Rating: PG-13 (Language|All Involving Teens|Sex References|Some Coarse and Suggestive Con)
Synopsis: Sixteen-year-old Poppy (Emma Roberts) has everything her unlimited credit cards can buy, and a spoiled attitude to match. After a final thoughtless prank, her exasperated father (Aidan Quinn) ships her off to boarding school in England. There, Poppy meets her match in a stern headmistress (Natasha Richardson) and a class full of girls who will not tolerate her selfishness.
Title: Wild Child
